price: 131. Kay Rabbi yoo inkittoysaay yoh uqunxuy kaak iyye waqdi, Nabii Ibraahim gino Rabbi inkittoyseeh kaah uqunxeeh iyye.
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُۥ رَبُّهُۥٓ أَسۡلِمۡۖ قَالَ أَسۡلَمۡتُ لِرَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahu rabbuhu aslim qāla aslamtu lirabbi al-ʿālamīna
